test_cases.name: Algorithm Confusion - alg none
test_cases.description: Attempt using 'alg: none' in JWE header. Should be rejected outright.

test_cases.name: Invalid alg/enc Value
test_cases.description: Supply a non-existent algorithm like 'A512XYZ' and check how the parser handles it.

test_cases.name: Key Reuse Check
test_cases.description: Verify if the same key is used for both signing and encryption operations.

test_cases.name: CBC Padding Oracle
test_cases.description: If using CBC, manipulate ciphertext to test for padding error response differences.

test_cases.name: Compression Oracle
test_cases.description: If 'zip' is enabled, observe whether token compression reveals sensitive data.

test_cases.name: JWE-JWS Confusion
test_cases.description: Submit encrypted tokens where signed ones are expected (or vice versa).

test_cases.name: Header Injection - 'kid' Manipulation
test_cases.description: Manipulate the 'kid' to force server to fetch attacker-controlled keys.

test_cases.name: Malformed Token - Truncated
test_cases.description: Send a token with only 3 parts instead of 5.

test_cases.name: Base64URL Corruption
test_cases.description: Insert invalid characters in base64url fields and analyze behavior.
